name: Destiny Hero
author: [MF'n] Sunblade NL
notes: Saw the deck in this channel by @grucius then it caught my attention but maybe it was a meme so waited till i saw another D Hero deck. Then i saw a baggio named @Brenduke - GB Expert also hit KoG with it which gave me the motivation to do the same. Quite easy but my opponents weren't that good unfortunately. Although this deck can win versus any match up.
